positions.title: VP of Information Technology
highlights: Helped the company transition into a modern technology focused company that uses software and solutions to provide a better product to our clients, with reduced costs and increased productivity
Utilized machine learning workflows for automating the interaction with real estate documents using AWS (Amazon Web Services) Textract and Comprehend.
Implemented multiple microservices (Python, C#) to support integration with our workflow software, 3rd party client systems, and other services.
Developed an inhouse desktop PDF viewer (C#/WPF) that integrated into our 3rd party workflow software *Providing* enhanced automation and efficiency when working with PDFs.

Created a full stack company intranet (Django, Vue) with in-depth reporting and business intelligence functionality, custom integrations with our workflow software, and tools to automate manual business processes.
Launched a full e-commerce website for individuals and smaller companies to order our services outside of our traditional workflow (Django, Vue, Stripe).
Migrated legacy systems to a fully virtualized highly available VMWare environment allowing for enhanced redundancy and reduced maintenance costs.

positions.title: IT Manager
highlights: Management of the company's IT infrastructure, including servers, software, and networking equipment.
Developed a basic business intelligence dashboard for monitoring of company production statistics.

positions.title: Event Coordinator, Systems Administrator, Tournament Organizer
highlights: Participated in event planning for multiple 200+ attendee esports and LAN events a year.
Handed setup and maintenance of our temporary network and server infrastructure.
Ran our headlining 16+ team Counter Strike: Global Offensive tournament.

positions.title: Game Server Administrator
highlights: Performed onsite setup of multiple Counter Strike game servers to support semi regular in person tournaments.
Managed the tournaments both onsite and remotely until they were able to hire someone for me to train in the management of the servers.

positions.title: Network Admin
highlights: Pre event setup and post event teardown of the temporary 1000+ user network infrastructure.

Management of a network with rapidly fluctuating usage that needed real time traffic shaping to meet the level of quality that our attendees expected, and to support the multiple high profile esports tournaments throughout the event.

positions.title: Computer Technician
highlights: Aided in the development and implementation of a ticking system for customer service tracking.
Helped grow our small business division by providing our customers with server setup, email migrations, backup solutions, and more.
Automated various in-house diagnostic tasks to simplify our workflow and increase productivity.

positions.title: Junior Systems Administrator
highlights: Managed onsite network and server infrastructure including Active Directory, SQL, Exchange, and Web servers.
Zero downtime migration from locally hosted Exchange Server to Microsoft Online Services.
Executed a physical office relocation and simultaneous upgrade from Windows XP to Windows 7 with little to no negative impact to our employees.
